Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Mark:

Text.Language: <ere nak w~pimarturoc: ,ere pieuaggelict/c: ,ere pia~poctoloc: Markoc piyew~rimoc.
Hail to you O martyr, hail to the evangelist, hail to the apostle, Mark the beholder of God.
السلام لك أيها الشهيد السلام للإنجيلي السلام للرسول مرقس ناظر الإله.
